name: Happy Restaurant Mania
description:
Happy Restaurant a fresh new cooking experience.
Hamburger,Pizza,Sandwiches,Yummy noodle! You want to quickly complete the production of those yummy foods.

For example,To do a big Mac hamburger is not easy, from making bread, vegetable, meat all done quickly, to meet the guest needs.So just enjoy your cooking time and do your best.

Features:
1. Simple and fun to cook
2. The exquisite animation operation
3. Global leaderboard,share yummy,challenge your friends

If you are a cooking mania,you will not miss it.Come and join the Happy Restaurant!
